title: 乌克兰军方在Bilohorivka，Luhansk地区的Zolotarivka和Yampoliv附近与俄罗斯部队进行了67次战斗。
content: UKRANIAN MILITARY HAD 67 Combat Engagagements with Russian Forces Near Bilohorivka, Zolotarivka of Luhansk Region and Yampolivka, Terny, Vesele of Donetsk Region, Bohdani VKA, IVANIVSKE, KLISCHIIIVKA of DONETSK Region, Berdychi, Semenivka, Tonenke, Pervomayske, Netaylove, NEVELSKE of DONETSK Region ，Krasnohorivka，Heorhiyivka，Novomykhaylivka，Vodyane，Uroozhayne，Donetsk地区的Staromayorske和Zaporizhia地区的Robotyne，位于Kherson地区的DNI Pro River的东岸Kherson地区 - 乌克兰（Ukraine）
author: Live UA Map
